00024 void FileSetRefEditor::onAdd() {
00025         QString item = ComboSelector::selectFileSet(component_, this);
00026 
00027         // if user wrote an empty string or if clicked cancel
00028         if (item.isEmpty()) {
00029                 return;
00030         }
00031 
00032         model_.appendItem(item);
00033 
00034         // inform that content of the widget has changed
00035         emit contentChanged();
00036         return;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void FileSetRefEditor::onEdit() {
00040         // ask the view for the selected index
00041         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00042 
00043         // if index was invalid (nothing was chosen)
00044         if (!index.isValid()) {
00045                 return;
00046         }
00047 
00048         // get the old text that is currently stored in the model
00049         QString oldText = model_.data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00050 
00051         // ask the user to set the new text
00052         QString newText = ComboSelector::selectFileSet(component_, this, oldText);
00053 
00054         // if empty string was given or cancel was pressed
00055         if (newText.isEmpty()) {
00056                 return;
00057         }
00058 
00059         // if user changed the text
00060         else if (oldText != newText) {
00061                 model_.replace(index, newText);
00062 
00063                 // inform that content of the widget has changed
00064                 emit contentChanged();
00065         }
00066 }
